  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_96170</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_96170</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Production de pommes de terre</string>
            <string language="en">Producing potatoes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Produzieren der Kartoffeln</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Produzindo batatas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Produrre le patate</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παραγωγή των πατατών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Producir las patatas</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration montre un tubercule de pomme de  terre. Des structures végétatives de cette pomme de terre  telle que l'oeil peuvent être employées pour produire plus de  pommes de terre.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows a potato tuber. Vegetative structures of this potato such as the eye can be used to produce more potatoes.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">la reproduction asexuelle</string>
            <string language="en">asexual reproduction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">clone</string>
            <string language="en">clones</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">oeil</string>
            <string language="en">eye</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">tubercule de pomme de terre</string>
            <string language="en">potato tuber</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">structure végétative</string>
            <string language="en">vegetative structure</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt eine Kartoffelknolle. 
Vegetative Strukturen dieser Kartoffel wie das Auge können 
benutzt werden, um mehr Kartoffeln zu produzieren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra um tuber da batata. 
As estruturas vegetative desta batata tais como o olho podem ser
usadas produzir mais batatas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra un tubero della 
patata. Le strutture vegetative di questa patata quale l'occhio 
possono essere usate per produrre più patate.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει βολβό πατατών. Οι 
φυτικές δομές αυτής της πατάτας όπως το μάτι μπορούν να 
χρησιμοποιηθούν για να παραγάγουν περισσότερες πατάτες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra un tubérculo de la 
patata. Las estructuras vegetativas de esta patata tales como el
ojo se pueden utilizar para producir más patatas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">asexuale Wiedergabe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">klont</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Auge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kartoffelknolle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">vegetative Struktur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">reprodução asexual</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">clones</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">olho</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">tuber da batata</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">estrutura vegetative</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">riproduzione asessuale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">clona</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">occhio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">tubero della patata</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">struttura vegetativa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αγενής αναπαραγωγή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κλώνοι</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μάτι</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">βολβός πατατών</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">φυτική δομή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">reproducción asexual</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">se reproduce</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ojo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">tubérculo de la patata</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">estructura vegetativa</string>
          </keyword>
